venue.name: Crystal Jade Metaphysical Shop & More, LLC

item.description:
Hello Friends in Spirit,

This is the official re-opening of the group. We will be meeting from 8:15-10:00pm. This will be an open forum for all metaphysical and spiritual discussion, future topics for discussion or exploration. I will begin with a 10 minute meditation and let the discussion flow from there. I will provide light refreshments and you are welcome to bring some as well.

Time: 8:15-10:00 pm
Cost: $10 (if you attend the card class before hand I will waive the attendance fee for this circle)
Location:
Crystal Jade Metaphysical Shop & More, LLC
151 Main St.
Unit 1
Salem, NH
603 912-5633

Refund Policy: I will not offer refunds for this event, if you rsvp and have paid by pay pal, you may use this towards a future event.
item.name: Metaphysical discussion circle
